Text.EN: White flag with holes in it

AdditionalInformation.EN: Has strange burn holes...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Hat seltsamerweise Brandlöcher...

AdditionalInformation.EN: Has nothing to do with cowardice!
AdditionalInformation.DE: Hat nichts mit Feigheit zu tun!

Description.EN: When one goes on a voyage...

AdditionalInformation.EN: Free Escort, any time!
AdditionalInformation.DE: Freies Geleit, jederzeit!

Text.EN: Expedition - Map of a lost Knight

AdditionalInformation.EN: Does this lead to his legacy?
AdditionalInformation.DE: Führt sie zu seinem Vermächtnis?

AdditionalInformation.EN: Does this lead to his legacy?
AdditionalInformation.DE: Führt sie zu seinem Vermächtnis?

Text.EN: Expedition - Marine chart covered in algae

AdditionalInformation.EN: Smells of Fish!
AdditionalInformation.DE: Riecht nach Fisch!

AdditionalInformation.EN: Smells of Fish!
AdditionalInformation.DE: Riecht nach Fisch!

AdditionalInformation.EN: Did not willingly change owners...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Hat nicht freiwillig den Besitzer gewechselt...

AdditionalInformation.EN: Did not willingly change owners...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Hat nicht freiwillig den Besitzer gewechselt...

AdditionalInformation.EN: Someone must break the seal...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Jemand muss das Siegel brechen...

AdditionalInformation.EN: Someone must break the seal...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Jemand muss das Siegel brechen...

Text.EN: Expedition - Treasure map shrouded in secrecy

AdditionalInformation.EN: Legends surround this Parchment...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Legenden ranken sich um dieses Pergament...

AdditionalInformation.EN: Legends surround this Parchment...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Legenden ranken sich um dieses Pergament...

Text.EN: Expedition - A very mysterious Treasure map

AdditionalInformation.EN: What can these cryptic symbols mean?
AdditionalInformation.DE: Was sollen die kryptischen Zeichen nur bedeuten?

AdditionalInformation.EN: What can these cryptic symbols mean?
AdditionalInformation.DE: Was sollen die kryptischen Zeichen nur bedeuten?

AdditionalInformation.EN: Who could make out this scrawl?
AdditionalInformation.DE: Wer soll dieses Gekrakel bloß entziffern?

AdditionalInformation.EN: Who could make out this scrawl?
AdditionalInformation.DE: Wer soll dieses Gekrakel bloß entziffern?

Text.EN: Expedition - Treasure map of a dead Nobleman

AdditionalInformation.EN: He took his secret with him to the grave...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Er nahm sein Geheimnis mit ins Grab...

Description.EN: Treasure map of a dead Nobleman

AdditionalInformation.EN: He took his secret with him to the grave...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Er nahm sein Geheimnis mit ins Grab...

AdditionalInformation.EN: It will take time to decipher it...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Es braucht Zeit, sie zu entziffern...

AdditionalInformation.EN: It will take time to decipher it...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Es braucht Zeit, sie zu entziffern...

AdditionalInformation.EN: Difficult to decipher...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Kaum zu entziffern...

AdditionalInformation.EN: Difficult to decipher...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Kaum zu entziffern...

AdditionalInformation.EN: Hopefully this is the more important half!
AdditionalInformation.DE: Hoffentlich ist dies die wichtigere Hälfte!

AdditionalInformation.EN: Hopefully this is the more important half!
AdditionalInformation.DE: Hoffentlich ist dies die wichtigere Hälfte!

AdditionalInformation.EN: Isn't the most important part missing?
AdditionalInformation.DE: Fehlt da nicht das wichtigste Stück?

AdditionalInformation.EN: Isn't the most important part missing?
AdditionalInformation.DE: Fehlt da nicht das wichtigste Stück?

AdditionalInformation.EN: Hoist it above the Crow's nest...
AdditionalInformation.DE: Über dem Krähennest anbringen...

Description.EN: For the good of the People
A look into the stars I
A look into the stars II
A look into the stars III
That's all the thanks you get
When one goes on a voyage...
